detail: All 71 Phase 2 tests pass: 8 dept-orchestrate, 10 dept-status, 9 dept-gate, 7 dept-cleanup, 5 agent-start, 4 state-updater, 10 protocol-file-coord-refs
All 606 tests pass (no regressions). Suite includes all unit tests and static tests.
All 4 dept scripts have set -euo pipefail, executable bit, no grep/sed on JSON
No spawnTeam/SendMessage refs in scripts/, flock locking in dept-status.sh, coordination patterns only in dept-cleanup.sh
02-01: 4 scripts + 34 tests green. 02-02: hooks modified + 9 tests green. 02-03: 4 protocols updated + 10 tests green. All acceptance criteria met.
